title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Check out the lesson plans available for use in your classroom.  Currently there is one on life in a mill village, the development of the Blackstone Canal in Worcester, and one on the story of immigrants from Quebec in the region. All Curriculum Materials       Insect sampling Learn More     Field Trips Click here for information on setting up a field trip for your class All Field Trips       Slater Mill Learn More
